abstract: Demand for the skills required by many new advertising jobs exceeds the number of professionals who have them, particularly in jobs requiring advanced mathematics and technical skills.
snippet: The demand for the skills required by many new advertising jobs exceeds the number of professionals who have them, particularly in jobs requiring advanced mathematics.
lead_paragraph: The demand for the skills required by many new advertising jobs exceeds the number of professionals who have them, particularly in jobs requiring advanced mathematics.

headline.main: Advertising Companies Fret Over a Digital Talent Gap
headline.print_headline: Advertising Companies Fret Over a Digital Talent Gap
headline.seo: Ad Companies Face a Widening Talent Gap
